alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 10:49AM CST until February 07 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River At Montgomery affecting Lowndes, Montgomery, Elmore, Dallas and Autauga Counties. .A flood warning continues to be in effect on the Alabama River near Montgomery. The river is expected to crest just below flood stage. This will be the last flood statement for the Alabama River at Montgomery for this event. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River At Montgomery. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Some flooding of low lying areas and secondary roads begins in the Montgomery area. Flooding of the golf course at Maxwell Air Force Base and portions of River Road occurs at stages around 30 feet and higher. At 35.0 feet, Extensive flooding of low lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 34.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near 34.9 feet this afternoon. Then a slow fall will commence. The river is expected to fall below action stage by Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
